"A.P.241/3/22/10:30": "<%me>. Hey, over here! Good morning, how are you?"
"Ah, I forgot to introduce myself! I'm Sierra, your exclusive operator! Nice to meet you!"
"I'm glad that you woke up without any problems."
"Do you feel strange anywhere? Signs of Darker reactions... Nope, it's all purified!"
"Hmm? Please state your puzzled condition. Could it be that your memories are mixed up?"
"This has happened a lot. We've already received contact from the medical unit."
"I know you just woke up, but I, your exclusive operator, Sierra... Will fill you in on the current situation!"
"At 『A.P.238/2/20』, You were enlisted, as ARKS, to complete a mission on planet Naberius."
"Would you like to skip this tutorial?"
